content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5 y=1.0), boiler(position x=1.5 y=3.0), and pipe-group(position x=1.5 y=-6.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore-pump(position x=-16.5 y=26.5), offshore-pump(position x=-18.5 y=27.5), and pipe-group(position x=-20.5 y=25.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5 y=32.0) and pipe-group(position x=-24.5 y=30.5)

### Pipe network at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of pipe-group(position x=1.5 y=-6.5), pipe-group(position x=3.5 y=-2.5), pipe-group(position x=-20.5 y=25.5), pipe-group(position x=-12.5 y=25.5), and pipe-group(position x=-5.5 y=25.5)

### Electricity network at position(x=5.9, y=1.1)
Consists of electricity-group(position x=5.9 y=1.1) and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5 y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipes near water
- Ensure that the pipe position does not overlap with water before attempting to place a pipe.
- Try placing the pipe at a different location that is not near water.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure that the entities are close enough to each other before attempting to connect them.
- Ensure that the entities are compatible with each other and can be connected.

### Errors when placing offshore pumps
- Ensure that there is an offshore pump in the inventory before attempting to place one.
- Make sure that the position where the offshore pump is being placed is valid and does not overlap with other entities.

### Errors when working with boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel and is connected to a pipe network before attempting to use it.
- Make sure that the boiler is not already working and that it is not connected to another entity that is not compatible with it.
